page.title: 19Newton
page.content: There are 3 farms in the area. There are 18 houses in the area. It is not likely to change much. The water in the mere is used for drinking water for cattle and for Ellesmere fishing club and canoeing. There are 2 bus stops and a mobile library. Mr Mainwaring owns most of the land. They used to walk down to the mere with buckets to wash themselves, they put chemicals in every year to stop the weed growing. The cottages did not have any water or electricity untill 60 years ago. All the water was collected into barrels from the down pipes of sheds. The coal sheds used to be pig stys. When the pig died it was jointed and hung in the houses.
